questions.question: What are the known financial fraud incidents or allegations against Ion Beam Applications SA?

queries.query: Ion Beam Applications SA financial fraud

results.text:
The consolidated accounts of Ion Beam Application SA for the fiscal year ended on December 31, 2022, have been audited by another auditor who expressed an unqualified opinion on these 
consolidated accounts in their report dated April 28, 2023. Responsibilities of the board of directors for the preparation of the consolidated accounts
